review: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST STREAMING STICK AVAILble
author: Steven Macias

review: This device is incredibly smooth and fast for a stick device and in addition to having all the wonderful amazon apps and additional content you can even side load other android apps on it as well.
author: Brosh

review: So far so good! I love this thing. I have access to Netflix, crackle, prime, and so much more right on my TV.
author: Jaqueline Chaguaceda

review: I never go around to finding a cable to hook my kindle fire tablet to my television, so I was left watching shows on my kindle (only good for one person) or thru the wii (which wasn't good quality and would pause).  This works so much better.  No trouble at all installing and registering my Fire TV Stick.  Very easy to use and the video quality is very good.
author: J. M. Ziegler

review: Love it!!!!! It is so easy to setup up and use its just like having your kindle in a bigger screen
author: maria stealey

review: Does the job well. Can now get and manage Netflix on my older Sony LED TV.
author: CK in Ames
